Text:
Thanks..............
Nice copy program, simple and fast.
Is this a cracked version, or is it just a copy of the official software?
Thanks for the upload Sunblock, worked perfectly, Cheers.

Jesus christ, seriously? How many layers of file compression do you need? First you extract the .rar, which creates 6 .zip files. Then you extract all the zips to the same directory, which leaves you with a .r00 through .r04. THEN when you extract the RAR, it says that two of the files are broken! Thankfully the .iso still seems to work.
